original: 輔臣以三種方式協助君主處理政務工作，可點選工作項目進行切換。調降君主命令，放權給輔臣時，可加快輔臣的發布工作命定的速度。
text: The minister assists the monarch in handling government affairs in three ways. You can click on the work item to switch. When lowering the monarch's order and delegating power to the ministers, the speed of the ministers' destiny can be accelerated.
